nodes.text: 5-L was a MSE-6 series repair droid who served the First Order during its war against the Resistance. When the TIE pilot Tam Ryvora wished to leave the First Order, she reprogrammed 5-L to assist her.

5-L appeared in the Star Wars Resistance episode "The Escape," which aired on January 26, 2020. Concept art for 5-L was designed by Aaron Pham, including a portion of the droid's interior, and was published on the episode's StarWars.com concept art gallery. The droid's designation is a tribute to Fievel Mousekewitz, the main character of the 1986 animated movie  An American Tail.
